column1: * 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mr Earle.
* 1958 - Voice actor Tony Oliver is born.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mother Mary Anthony.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to James Ridolfo.
* 1981 - The sixth episode of The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
** Eorl and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.
